page.description: The .RTF_TEXT property returns the text and RTF encoding of the RTF object.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P dim rdata as C ptr = rtf.create("Alpha!") rdata = ptr.rtf_text rdata -> "{\rtf1\ansi \deff0{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;}{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss Arial;}}{{\f0 \cf1 \fs16 Alpha!}}}"
